headline: Asian markets drop with Wall St as tech fears revive
summary: Asian markets dropped Monday as concerns about the AI-fuelled tech rally returned to the spotlight after weak earnings from two big-name firms last week revived questions about the wisdom of the vast sums invested in the sector.Those concerns were compounded last week following disappointing earnings from sector giants Oracle and Broadcom.

content.title: Asian markets drop with Wall St as tech fears revive
content.summary: Asian markets dropped Monday as concerns about the AI-fuelled tech rally returned to the spotlight after weak earnings from two big-name firms last week revived questions about the wisdom of the vast sums invested in the sector.Those concerns were compounded last week following disappointing earnings from sector giants Oracle and Broadcom.

thumbnail.caption: Markets in Japan and South Korea led losses across Asia on Monday (Kazuhiro NOGI)

headline: PolyAI raises $86M to transform how enterprises talk to their customers
summary: PolyAI, a leader in enterprise conversational AI, has raised $86 million in Series D funding, co-led by Georgian, Hedosophia, and Khosla Ventures. Additional investors include NVentures (NVIDIA's venture capital arm), British Business Bank, Citi Ventures, Squarepoint Ventures, Sands Capital, Zendesk Ventures, and Point72 Ventures.

content.title: PolyAI raises $86M to transform how enterprises talk to their customers
content.summary: PolyAI, a leader in enterprise conversational AI, has raised $86 million in Series D funding, co-led by Georgian, Hedosophia, and Khosla Ventures. Additional investors include NVentures (NVIDIA's venture capital arm), British Business Bank, Citi Ventures, Squarepoint Ventures, Sands Capital, Zendesk Ventures, and Point72 Ventures.

headline: Latest News In AI Chips - Strategic Partnership Powers Innovation In Robotics And Sustainability
summary: Recent developments in the realm of AI Chips have seen WELLE Environmental Group and Primech Holdings enter a strategic agreement to advance innovation in industrial robotics and sustainable operations. The partnership focuses on the creation and deployment of specialized industrial robots for challenging environments and aims to integrate robotics with environmental engineering for improved efficiency and sustainability. By leveraging WELLE’s expertise in environmental governance and Primech...

headline: AI Tech Stocks Edge Up as Tech Selloff Abates
summary: U.S. AI-related stocks were edging up premarket as the sector recovered slightly from a bruising end to last week. Broadcom gained 0.8% premarket after closing down 11% Friday, while software company Oracle, the catalyst for last week's tech stumble, gained 0.

content.title: AI Tech Stocks Edge Up as Tech Selloff Abates
content.summary: U.S. AI-related stocks were edging up premarket as the sector recovered slightly from a bruising end to last week. Broadcom gained 0.8% premarket after closing down 11% Friday, while software company Oracle, the catalyst for last week's tech stumble, gained 0.

headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks on Our Watchlist and 1 We Turn Down
summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.
